attributes.additional_details: As a dog owner I am responsible to ensure that my dog is not to cause harm to others soil others properties and public spaces and to avoid any potential damage to properties, cat owners however have 0 restrictions in place to ensure that their animal does not cause any harm, damage or soiling private and public areas. I believe there should be more restrictions put in place to ensure that cats owners are held responsible for their animals.
attributes.background: I would like to see laws introduced that make cat owners responsible for cats damaging others properties, soiling private and public areas and causing harm to wildlife and humans outside of their home.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588684
